public class AdminAccount
extends java.lang.Object
implements Account
Represents an admin account

  • Constructor Details

    • AdminAccount

      public AdminAccount​(java.lang.String adminId) throws java.io.IOException, UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException
      For accessing actions that an admin can do
      Parameters:
      adminId - the id of the admin
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if database file has issues
      UserNotFoundException - if this admin doesn't exist
      AuthorizationException - if this user isn't an admin

    • processItemRequest

      public void processItemRequest​(java.lang.String traderID, int itemIndex, boolean isAccepted) throws EntryNotFoundException, AuthorizationException
      Process the item request of a user
      Parameters:
      traderID - ID of the trader
      itemIndex - index of the item
      isAccepted - true if item is accepted, false if rejected
      Throws:
      EntryNotFoundException - traderName / itemName not found
      AuthorizationException - if the user isn't a trader
